name: Magic BreakOut!
description:
Magic Breakout!

Hi!

This is  a version of the classic breakout (Arkanoid) where you control a mage that use a shield spell to repeal a magic ball that breaks the bricks in the levels.

The game count with three levels with different assets, like song, background and bricks. The options are simple, the player can change the color of his spell shield and ball, also you can mute the music and sound.
